siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Chatwoot: Open-source, self-hosted customer engagement platform, opensource alternative to Intercom, Zendesk
siteMetadata.titleTemplate: %s | Chatwoot, opensource alternative to Intercom, Zendesk
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: Chatwoot is an open-source customer engagement platform that helps companies engage their customers on their website, Facebook page, Twitter, Whatsapp, SMS, email, etc. Chatwoot is an open-source alternative to Intercom, Zendesk, Salesforce Service Cloud etc. Connect your customer conversation channels and converse with your customers from a single place.
